name: MetaVerse-M
public_notice: The smart-contract owner can mint new tokens, please proceed with caution.

description.en: Meta (M) is a decentralized exchange running on Binance Smart Chain. What we built is a perpetual deflationary system, the (M) Token allows a constant price increase with a sufficient burning mechanism. We are not trying to replace the other exchanges but want to add value into the eco-system and create a suitable and sustainable environment for people to yield farm with safe and high returns.
